long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ› YOUR SHOPPING ASSISTANT
Browse your favorite stores, and shop as usual.
The extension will alert you as soon as a discount or a good deal is available on our partner stores.


ğŸ”¥ HOTTEST DEALS FROM OUR COMMUNITY
Top deals from the Hotukdeals community at your fingertips!
Access the best deals and freebies from diverse retailers in a click, all shared by our savvy shopper community.


âœ¨  AUTOMATIC TEST OF COUPONS
No need to search for discounts on the internet anymore!
As soon as you are on a shopping cart page, the GSG extension will automatically test all available coupons and apply the best. 


âœ… YOUR PRIVACY
Pepper only identifies partner website URLs to offer you discounts when you make purchases.â€¨For more information please visit our Privacy Policy: 
- https://www.pepper.pl/privacy-policy
- https://nl.pepper.com/privacy-policy
- https://www.pepper.it/privacy

We will never collect your addresses, transactions, balances or any other personal information.

We will never sell your data to anyone.

Cookies settings

Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the extension: Number of visitors, traffic source, etc. You can always change or withdraw your consent from the settings page. For more information please visit our Cookie Policy:
- https://www.pepper.pl/cookies-policy
- https://nl.pepper.com/cookiebeleid
- https://www.pepper.it/politica-cookie

âœ¨  PROVA I CODICI AUTOMATICAMENTE
Non c'Ã¨ piÃ¹ bisogno di cercare codici sconto su Internet!
Non appena sarai nella pagina del carrello, l'estensione GSG proverÃ  automaticamente tutti i codici sconto disponibili e applicherÃ  il migliore. 


âœ… LA TUA PRIVACY
Pepper.it identifica solo gli URL dei siti web partner per offrirti sconti quando effettui acquisti. Per ulteriori informazioni visita la nostra Politica per la Privacy (https://www.pepper.it/privacy).

Non raccoglieremo mai i tuoi indirizzi, transazioni, saldo o qualsiasi altra informazione personale.

Non venderemo mai i tuoi dati.

Impostazioni dei cookie

I cookie analitici vengono utilizzati per capire come i visitatori interagiscono con l'estensione: numero di visitatori, fonte di traffico, ecc. Puoi sempre modificare o revocare il tuo consenso dalla pagina delle impostazioni. Per maggiori informazioni visita la nostra Cookie Policy (https://www.pepper.it/politica-cookie)
long.nl:
ğŸ› JOUW SHOPPING ASSISTENT
Blader door je favoriete winkels en winkel zoals je gewend bent. De extensie waarschuwt je zodra er een kortingscode of een goede deal beschikbaar is bij onze partnerwinkels.


ğŸ”¥ DE HEETSTE DEALS VAN ONZE COMMUNITY
Top deals van de Pepper-community binnen handbereik! Krijg toegang tot de beste aanbiedingen en freebies van diverse winkels in een klik, allemaal gedeeld door onze slimme shopper community.


âœ¨ AUTOMATISCH TESTEN VAN CODES 
Zodra je op een pagina met je winkelwagentje bent, test de Pepper-extensie automatisch alle beschikbare coupons en past de beste toe.


âœ… JOUW PRIVACY
Pepper identificeert alleen URL's van partnerwebsites om je kortingen aan te bieden wanneer je aankopen doet.â€¨Ga voor meer informatie naar ons Privacybeleid (https://nl.pepper.com/privacy-policy )

Wij zullen nooit je adressen, transacties, saldo's of andere persoonlijke informatie verzamelen.

We zullen je gegevens nooit aan iemand verkopen.

Cookie-instellinge

Analytische cookies worden gebruikt om te begrijpen hoe bezoekers omgaan met de extensie: Aantal bezoekers, verkeersbron, enz. Je kunt jouw toestemming altijd wijzigen of intrekken via de instellingenpagina. Ga voor meer informatie naar ons cookiebeleid (https://nl.pepper.com/cookiebeleid )
